summary: Implements a high‑level pipeline that converts textual prompts into images using a diffusion model. The class orchestrates tokenization, text encoding, latent preparation, stochastic noise addition, iterative denoising with a UNet, and final decoding through a VAE to produce PIL images.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑use example for developers and researchers to integrate text‑to‑image diffusion capabilities into applications, accelerating prototyping and product development of AI‑generated visual content.
